name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Cloud Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing and managing cloud-native infrastructures utilizing **AWS**, **GCP**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, **Docker**, and **Jenkins**. My proficiency in automation and CI/CD processes ensures seamless continuous deployment and infrastructure as code, enabling efficient and secure application deployment in highly regulated environments. I possess deep expertise in **Python** and have a solid understanding of **Node.js**, leveraging these skills to integrate and optimize cloud services effectively.

In addition to my cloud-based expertise, I am familiar with **Kubernetes** for orchestration, **Grafana** and **Prometheus** for monitoring, and have knowledge of various technologies including **Bash**, **Ruby**, and **Java**. My strong foundation in Linux systems enhances my ability to maintain and troubleshoot diverse environments. I have a proven track record of contributing to the successful delivery of scalable solutions while adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Passionate about continuous learning, I am driven to explore innovative technologies and enhance operational excellence.
